scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"

scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --prefix backend && npm run test:ci --prefix frontend
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "npm run test:coverage --prefix backend" "npm run test:coverage --prefix frontend"
scripts.test:ui: concurrently "npm run test:ui --prefix backend" "npm run test:ui --prefix frontend"
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test:watch --prefix backend" "npm run test:watch --prefix frontend"
